Name: Koffiehoek Pleur en de Koek
Review Text: Good quality food and drinks and a very cosy little spot in an otherwise very boring shopping centre! ❤️

Name: Koffiehoek Pleur en de Koek
Review Text: The best coffee and atmosphere in Amsterdam North!

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious coffee (also fake coffee) and delicious cakes. The Turkish bread toasted sandwiches are also tasty. The setting is relaxed, between the vintage. Also toys for the kids. Pearl of the North! …
